title: How to report inappropriate names outside of end of game screen?
body:
I have just noticed someone in my friends list with a completely inappropriate name, but since I've never played a game with them, I can't report it.

How do?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Do feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) regarding the players name, Player Support will forward the information onto the correct team.

Remember, you won't receive any feedback about any actions taken against the player due to privacy concerns.
